attributes.action: Make the UK carbon neutral by 2050
attributes.additional_details:
https://www.nationalgeographic.com/environment/global-warming/global-warming-solutions/
'Window is narrowing': scientists urge action at UN climate talks

https://www.theguardian.com/environment/2018/dec/11/the-window-is-narrowing-scientists-urge-action-at-un-climate-talks?CMP=Share_AndroidApp_Copy_to_clipboard
attributes.background: We have 12 years until the damage to our climate and the enhanced climate change is irreversible. We need to prioritize investing into mitigation strategies in enhanced climate change so that we can aim to be carbon neutral by 2050
